description:
During a crucial moment, Kurokan wants everyone to use the deadly Kirino tactic. Ishimitsu passes the ball to the home plate. Kirino successfully tags the Hanaoka runner and wins the ticket to Koshien.  However, Kurokan gets nothing but blame for his arrogant attitude. Kurokan doesn`t want to go back to the traditional way and decides to walk away.
Source: crunchyroll
